title: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Complete Pack-GOG
description:
The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing - Complete Pack (c) Neocore Games

Release Date : 09/2015
Protection : -
Discs : 1
Genre : RPG
Languages : EN/FR/DE/IT/ES/PL/RU/CZ/HU/PT

Put on your wide-brimmed hat, grab your weapons and
embark  on   an   incredible   adventure   in   the
gothic-noir world of Borgovia,  where  mad  science
threatens the fragile  peace  between  monster  and
mortal.    Be    Van    Helsing,     monster-hunter
extraordinaire and save the day with your  charming
and beautiful companion, Lady Katarina (who happens
to be a ghost, by  the  way).  Explore  the  savage
wilderness in the mountains  and  the  soot-stained
brick districts of a  grim  metropolis  twisted  by
weird science, and don't forget:  you  might  never
know who the real monsters are!

This official Complete Pack includes:

* The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing (main game)
* Blue Blood DLC
* Arcane Mechanic DLC
* Thaumaturge DLC
* Bonus Pack

- Install
- Play
